Interface ConversionResult<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the result
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConversionResult.Failure, ConversionResult.Success
public sealed interface ConversionResult<T> permits ConversionResult.Success<T>, ConversionResult.Failure<T>

Represents the final result of a type conversion.

Example:

switch (result) {
    case ConversionResult.Success<Object>(Object success, boolean lossless) -> ...; // proceed with converted object
    case ConversionResult.Failure<?> failure -> log(failure);
}
See Also:
  • Proteus.convert(Object, Type, Type)

    Implementation of ConversionResult that indicates a failed conversion.
    static final record 
    ConversionResult.Success<T>
    Implementation of ConversionResult that indicates a successful conversion.

  • Method Details

    • of

      @NotNull static <T> @NotNull ConversionResult<T> of(@NotNull @NotNull MappingResult<T> result, @NotNull ConversionResult.Failure.ErrorType errorType, @Nullable @Nullable ConversionResult.ConversionContext context)
      Creates a new ConversionResult with the given input.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the result
      Parameters:
      result - the MappingResult to create the ConversionResult from. This is either a MappingResult.Lossless (or MappingResult.Lossy) <from the very last step or a MappingResult.Failure from any step that failed
      errorType - the ConversionResult.Failure.ErrorType to use if the given MappingResult is a MappingResult.Failure
      context - the ConversionResult.ConversionContext, can be null if this ConversionResult wasn't created during conversion
      Returns:
      the newly created ConversionResult

    • orElse

      @NotNull default T orElse(@NotNull T other)
      If a value is present, returns the value, otherwise returns other.
      Parameters:
      other - the value to be returned, if no value is present.
      Returns:
      the value, if present, otherwise other

    • orElseGet

      @NotNull default T orElseGet(@NotNull @NotNull Supplier<? extends T> supplier)
      If a value is present, returns the value, otherwise returns the result produced by the supplying function.
      Parameters:
      supplier - the supplying function that produces a value to be returned
      Returns:
      the value, if present, otherwise the result produced by the supplying function

    • orElseThrow

      @NotNull default T orElseThrow()
      If a value is present, returns the value, otherwise throws NoSuchElementException.
      Returns:
      the non-null value described by this ConversionResult

    • orElseThrow

      @NotNull default <X extends Throwable> T orElseThrow(@NotNull @NotNull Supplier<? extends X> exceptionSupplier) throws X
      If a value is present, returns the value, otherwise throws an exception produced by the exception supplying function.
      Type Parameters:
      X - Type of the exception to be thrown
      Parameters:
      exceptionSupplier - the supplying function that produces an exception to be thrown
      Returns:
      the value, if present
      Throws:
      X - if no value is present

    • toOptional

      default Optional<T> toOptional()
      Converts this result into an Optional.
      Returns:
      the Optional wrapping this result

    • toOptional

      default Optional<T> toOptional(Consumer<ConversionResult.Failure<T>> loggingAction)
      Converts this result into an Optional and accepts the given Consumer if this result is a ConversionResult.Failure.
      Parameters:
      loggingAction - the operation to perform if this result is a ConversionResult.Failure
      Returns:
      the Optional wrapping this result
